item.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
item.description: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive.”

item.title: Groq execs to join Nvidia as part of AI-chip licensing deal
item.description: Nvidia has entered into a nonexclusive licensing agreement with AI-chip maker Groq, and will acquire some of the startup’s executive team.

item.title: For investors, the real gift from Wall Street comes one day after Christmas
item.description: For the S&P 500, Dec. 26 has historically been the most reliably positive day of the year.

item.title: Would you take a $120,000 pay cut to work from home full time?
item.description: The latest stage in the remote work vs. in-office debate sees people arguing on TikTok and Reddit over whether to take a remote job paying $120K, or a...

item.title: Sorry, winning Powerball’s $1.7 billion jackpot won’t make you a billionaire. Here’s why you might end up with $136.6 million instead.
item.description: Various factors can reduce a lottery prize, from taxes to the cost of a limo ride.
